thread.title: Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya to be seen in Akhil song
thread.title_full: Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya to be seen in Akhil song - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya to be seen in Akhil song
text: Akkineni Nagarjuna's son, Akhil Akkineni stormed into Tollywood with his widely appreciated cameo in ANR's family film Manam and now he is all set to make his debut with 'Akhil'. We had earlier reported that Akkineni Nagarajuna and Naga Chaitanya will be seen in 'Akhil' introduction song. Now, the latest update is that the final song featuring Nagarjuna and Akhil has been completed yesterday in a specially erected set in Annapurna Studios and with this, Nag has completed his part of shoot. It is heard that the song has shaped up quite well. The remaining part of the song was supposed to be wrapped up in one or two days and with this song, the entire shooting part will be completed. In the meantime, the post production works have also neared completion. Directed by VV. Vinayak, the film is being produced by Nithiin on Sreshth movies banner. Sayyesha Saigal is playing Akhil's love interest in the film. Anup Rubens and SS Thaman are the music directors for the film and it is slated for a grand release on October 22.
